segments.text: What is the matter with you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've got a sore throat and my chest hurts .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long have you been like this ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It has been two or three days .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think you've got a flu.Take this prescription to the chemist's and then go back and sleep .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't worry about your flu . You will be OK soon .
segments.speaker: S1
